cta.title: Experience Authentic Thai Healing
cta.text: Book your personalized massage treatment today and discover the lasting relief that skilled, authentic Thai massage can provide. Lamai is ready to help you overcome pain and stress.

about-page.description: Meet Lamai, experienced Thai massage therapist trained in traditional healing arts in Buriram, Thailand. Personalized care in Berlin with 30+ years expertise.
about-page.title: The Journey Behind Dusit Thai Massage
about-page.p-1: Lamai's connection to Thai massage began long before it became her profession. Growing up in Buriram, Thailand, she learned the ancient healing art directly from her mother—not in a classroom, but through years of hands-on practice and observation. This authentic knowledge, passed down through genuine experience, gave her an intuitive understanding of the body's pressure points, energy lines, and the therapeutic power of skilled touch that no certificate alone could provide.
about-page.p-2: After moving to Germany 30 years ago, life took Lamai on different paths, but the knowledge and passion for Thai massage remained with her. In 2020, she returned to her true calling, joining a professional massage studio in Berlin where she spent several years treating clients with diverse needs—from chronic pain and sports injuries to stress relief and wellness maintenance. In early 2025, she opened Dusit Thai Massage with a clear vision: to create a trusted space where clients could experience genuine healing, lasting pain relief, and the personalized attention that makes a real difference.
about-page.p-3: Today, clients consistently praise Lamai's ability to identify and release tension that others overlook. Her combination of authentic Thai techniques with decades of hands-on experience allows her to provide treatments that go beyond surface relaxation. Whether you're dealing with chronic back pain, recovering from physical strain, or simply need to escape daily stress, Lamai brings genuine expertise and attentive care to every session at Dusit Thai Massage.
about-page.p-4: My goal is simple—to help every client feel real relief and leave feeling better than when they arrived. This is not just my work, it's my passion.

items.heading: Our Journey
items.p: Established in September 2025, our practice represents the culmination of Khun Pui's 20+ year journey from Northeast Thailand to becoming Berlin's trusted Thai massage specialist.

items.heading: Our Team
items.p: We operate as a close-knit family team with two primary practitioners - Khun Pui and her daughter - supported by her husband who handles business operations.

items.heading: Our Space
items.p: Our serene practice features four professional massage beds in an aromatherapy environment, complete with private facilities and convenient street parking options.

footer.p: Extra content if you need it, if not you can delete this whole p tag. I usually do.
